statements: SELECT * FROM refugee_migration_patterns WHERE country_of_origin = 'Syria';
SELECT country_of_origin, destination_country FROM refugee_migration_patterns WHERE year_of_migration > 2015;
SELECT refugee_id, country_of_origin, migration_reason FROM refugee_migration_patterns WHERE destination_country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM refugee_migration_patterns WHERE year_of_migration BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year_of_migration DESC;
SELECT MAX(year_of_migration) AS latest_year FROM refugee_migration_patterns WHERE country_of_origin = 'Iraq';
SELECT * FROM refugee_migration_patterns WHERE year_of_migration = 2020;
SELECT country_of_origin, destination_country, migration_reason FROM refugee_migration_patterns WHERE destination_country = 'Germany';
SELECT refugee_id, country_of_origin FROM refugee_migration_patterns WHERE year_of_migration BETWEEN 2010 AND 2015 ORDER BY country_of_origin ASC;
SELECT * FROM refugee_migration_patterns WHERE migration_reason LIKE '%war%';
SELECT COUNT(refugee_id) AS total_refugees, destination_country FROM refugee_migration_patterns GROUP BY destination_country ORDER BY total_refugees DESC;
SELECT * FROM migration_trends
SELECT country_id, year FROM migration_trends
SELECT country_id, refugee_count FROM migration_trends WHERE year = 2021
SELECT * FROM country_info
SELECT country_name, region FROM country_info
SELECT * FROM migration_trends WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY country_id DESC, refugee_count ASC
SELECT country_name, region FROM country_info WHERE population > 1000000 ORDER BY country_name
SELECT country_name, year, refugee_count FROM migration_trends JOIN country_info ON migration_trends.country_id = country_info.country_id WHERE year = 2015 AND region = 'Europe'

SELECT country_name, year, refugee_count FROM migration_trends JOIN country_info ON migration_trends.country_id = country_info.country_id WHERE refugee_count > 5000 AND population < 500000 ORDER BY refugee_count DESC, population ASC
SELECT country_name, region, refugee_count FROM country_info LEFT JOIN migration_trends ON country_info.country_id = migration_trends.country_id AND year = 2018 WHERE refugee_count IS NULL
SELECT * FROM refugee_countries;
SELECT country_name, country_id FROM refugee_countries WHERE country_name='Syria';
SELECT migration_id, refugee_count FROM refugee_migration WHERE refugee_count > 10000 ORDER BY refugee_count DESC;
SELECT migration_year, migration_date FROM migration_years WHERE migration_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY migration_year ASC;
SELECT country_id, COUNT(*) AS total_migrations FROM refugee_migration GROUP BY country_id HAVING total_migrations > 1;
SELECT country_name, refugee_count FROM refugee_countries INNER JOIN refugee_migration ON refugee_countries.country_id = refugee_migration.country_id
SELECT * FROM migration_years ORDER BY migration_date DESC
SELECT country_name, SUM(refugee_count) AS total_refugees FROM refugee_countries INNER JOIN refugee_migration ON refugee_countries.country_id = refugee_migration.country_id GROUP BY country_name

SELECT country_name, migration_date FROM refugee_countries INNER JOIN refugee_migration ON refugee_countries.country_id = refugee_migration.country_id INNER JOIN migration_years ON refugee_migration.migration_id = migration_years.migration_id
SELECT country_name, AVG(refugee_count) AS avg_refugees FROM refugee_countries INNER JOIN refugee_migration ON refugee_countries.country_id = refugee_migration.country_id GROUP BY country_name
SELECT * FROM RefugeeCountries;
SELECT country_name, total_refugees FROM RefugeeCountries ORDER BY total_refugees DESC;
SELECT country_name, total_refugees FROM RefugeeCountries WHERE total_refugees > 5000;
SELECT movement_id, origin_country_id, destination_country_id, movement_date FROM RefugeeMovements ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT dem.country_id, dem.age_group, dem.gender, dem.population_count, cou.country_name FROM RefugeeDemographics dem JOIN RefugeeCountries cou ON dem.country_id = cou.country_id;
SELECT * FROM RefugeeCountries ORDER BY country_name ASC, total_refugees DESC;
SELECT country_name, total_refugees FROM RefugeeCountries WHERE total_refugees > 10000;
SELECT movement_date, movement_reason FROM RefugeeMovements WHERE movement_date >= '2022-01-01' AND movement_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT RC.country_name, COUNT(RD.demographic_id) AS total_demographics FROM RefugeeCountries RC LEFT JOIN RefugeeDemographics RD ON RC.country_id = RD.country_id GROUP BY RC.country_name;
SELECT RS.status_date, RS.status, RM.origin_country_id, RM.destination_country_id FROM RefugeeStatus RS JOIN RefugeeMovements RM ON RS.movement_id = RM.movement_id WHERE RS.status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM refugee_countries;
SELECT country_name, country_id FROM refugee_countries ORDER BY country_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM refugee_migration WHERE migration_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT migration_id, country_of_origin, destination_country FROM refugee_migration WHERE migration_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT demographic_id, age, gender FROM refugee_demographics WHERE age > 18 AND gender = 'female';
SELECT * FROM refugee_countries ORDER BY country_name DESC;
SELECT country_name, COUNT(*) AS total_refugees FROM refugee_countries JOIN refugee_migration ON refugee_countries.country_id = refugee_migration.destination_country GROUP BY country_name;
SELECT migration_id, country_of_origin, destination_country, migration_date FROM refugee_migration WHERE migration_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY migration_date DESC;
SELECT demographic_id, migration_id, age, gender FROM refugee_demographics WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT camp_id, location, capacity FROM refugee_camps WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
